levels.name: level-00
levels.description: Essential security fundamentals for newcomers - start your cybersecurity journey with the most common web vulnerabilities

labs.name: xss-1
labs.description: A modern user profile management platform that allows users to create and customize their personal profiles with dynamic content rendering and social features.

labs.name: ssrf-1
labs.description: A professional asset loading service that fetches and processes external resources for web applications, providing URL-based content integration capabilities.

labs.name: auth-1
labs.description: A modern enterprise portal providing secure access to corporate resources through cookie-based authentication and user session management.

labs.name: autho-1
labs.description: A professional information management platform with user authentication and content access controls for organizing and viewing corporate documents.

labs.name: codex-1
labs.description: An advanced code processing system designed for development environments, featuring dynamic text processing and expression evaluation capabilities.

labs.name: comex-1
labs.description: A professional network diagnostics platform that provides connectivity testing services and real-time network monitoring capabilities for system administrators.

labs.name: dirtrav-1
labs.description: A professional corporate asset gallery platform for managing and displaying media files with dynamic file serving capabilities.
labs.objective: Retrieve sensitive files from the server

levels.name: level-01
levels.description: Core vulnerability exploitation techniques - build practical skills with real-world attack scenarios

labs.name: cve-2014-6271
labs.description: A system monitoring dashboard that provides real-time server statistics and system health information through CGI-based web interfaces.

labs.name: jwt-1
labs.description: A secure web application using JSON Web Tokens (JWT) for user authentication and session management with role-based access controls.

labs.name: sqli-1
labs.description: A feature-rich news portal with user authentication, content management, and article publishing capabilities for journalists and editors.
labs.objective: Extract admin credentials via SQL injection

labs.name: pickle
labs.description: A Python web application that handles user sessions and data serialization for maintaining persistent user state across requests.

levels.name: level-02
levels.description: Advanced exploitation scenarios - tackle complex vulnerabilities and sophisticated attack chains used by real threat actors

labs.name: cve-2016-10033
labs.description: A professional contact form service that handles email communications and message delivery for business websites using automated email processing.

labs.name: jwt-2
labs.description: An enterprise-grade application with enhanced JWT security measures for user authentication, featuring advanced token validation and cryptographic algorithms.

levels.name: level-03
levels.description: Expert-level security challenges - master the most sophisticated vulnerabilities and attack techniques used by advanced threat actors

labs.name: jwt-3
labs.description: A modern enterprise portal platform that provides secure access to corporate resources and administrative functions. Features user registration, authentication system, and role-based access controls for different organizational levels.

levels.name: level-04
levels.description: Advanced GraphQL security challenges - explore API introspection vulnerabilities and data exposure techniques

labs.name: graphql-1
labs.description: A modern project management platform built with GraphQL API that provides comprehensive project tracking and team collaboration features for enterprise environments.
labs.objective: Extract sensitive information via GraphQL introspection

levels.name: level-05
levels.description: Advanced Cross-Site Scripting techniques - master sophisticated XSS attack vectors and client-side security bypasses

labs.name: xssinclude
labs.description: A professional secure vault platform for managing personal secrets with dynamic JavaScript-based content loading and user session management.

levels.name: level-06
levels.description: Advanced authentication and authorization vulnerabilities - master SAML security issues and identity provider attacks

labs.name: saml-1
labs.description: A professional enterprise identity management platform featuring SAML-based single sign-on with identity provider and service provider integration.
labs.objective: Log in as admin via SAML response manipulation

levels.name: level-07
levels.description: Advanced JWT signature vulnerabilities - explore JWT signing oracle attacks and cryptographic key reuse vulnerabilities

labs.name: signing-oracle
labs.description: A secure enterprise key management platform with JWT-based session management and access controls for protecting sensitive cryptographic keys and data.
labs.objective: Access admin secrets via JWT signing oracle
